title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry pancetta. Whisk eggs with cheese. Combine all and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy spiced tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken, grill until charred, then simmer in sauce until thickened.

title: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and healthy breakfast with creamy avocado spread on toasted bread.
instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with seasoning. Spread on toast and top with chili flakes.
